attributes.action: Invest in the railways, therefore reducing road traffic and pollution
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the Government needs ways to reduce road traffic and pollution, I feel that a large investment in the rail network is required. This would take many lorries off of the road at a stroke, reduce congestion and reduce pollution.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
